about.intro: Hello, my name is Eishta Mittal. I have over 6 years of experience as a Software Developer. My interest in web development began in 2018 when I was assigned my first task at Sopra Steria. The enjoyment of designing and experimenting with the user interface fascinated me. I found it exhilarating, and since then, it has been an integral part of my journey. Delving deeper into frontend development, I have explored React JS, Ember JS, and Vue. Currently, my primary focus is on learning Next JS and server-side rendering.

testimonials.name: Bidisha Das
testimonials.desc: Motivated, good to work with and extremely Knowledgable. Eishta has always been hard working and dedicated and we have solved a lot of problems together.

testimonials.name: Divya Chauhan
testimonials.desc: Very talented and professional developer. Got to learn a lot working with you Eishta! Highly recommended..

testimonials.name: Pulkit Kashyap
testimonials.desc: Eishta is a quick learner and a very hardworking person. I worked with her on various UI related tasks. She quickly took ownership of various tracks and made sure to deliver them on time. Also, really appreciate the fact she would go above and beyond to help her peers.

testimonials.name: Bhanupriya KaliaBhanupriya
testimonials.desc: Eishta is a hard working person and a team worker. It was really nice to work with her on a project which demanded a lot of effort and attention to details, and she was able to work calmly under pressure even after not being well.

testimonials.name: Naveen Jain
testimonials.desc: Eishta was a fantastic person to work with, and is not only a multi-skilled and insightful colleague, but also an inspiring strategist. She is very passionate and has great vision for his work. Her focus keeps everything moving smoothly, she makes sure all the deadlines are met, and makes sure that whatever project she is working on, meets the highest standards. Very good person. Great employee with a very strong problem solving skills. Eishta is an asset to any company

testimonials.name: Anshul Gupta
testimonials.desc: I was impressed by eishta ability to handle any situation calmly and patiently, even with the toughest clients. Her multitasking abilty helped us to achieve most of the tasks with in a time.

testimonials.name: Vikram Kharata
testimonials.desc: Eishta is an excellent team player & is full stack developer with a niche in frontend skills. I worked with her for more than 2 years, and found her to be a dependable, enthusiastic & motivated team player. She adapts to situations quickly & has an eagerness to learn more. I have seen her transition from a college graduate to a skilled & confident software developer. She is an asset to any team & I am sure she will reach new heights of success.

testimonials.name: Vartika Gupta
testimonials.desc: I worked with Eishta for delivering few critical frontend tasks. She possess strong analysis and code debugging skills. Her inquisitiveness to understand functional model for modules is much appreciated. She was also part of project events coordinating team and always ensured perfect and well organised execution of all sort of project events.

testimonials.name: Nikhil Gupta
testimonials.desc: I have worked with Eishta for around 2 years in a large scale project. Although being a fresh graduate, I have seen Eishta handling frontend of the project module single-handedly, she had been a significant key player for the success of the project. The best part of Eishta is that she believes in constant learning and thus always provides best and optimal solution to any sort of questions. She is very optimistic and a smart worker, I wish all the luck to her future endeavours.

testimonials.name: Himanshu Chitkara
testimonials.desc: It’s rare that you come across standout talent like Eishta.I had the pleasure of working with her for two years at Sopra Steria, collaborating on several project teams.Her ability to juggle multiple projects was unlike any I’ve seen before and made a dramatic difference in the productivity level of our team.She would be an asset to any team.
